base:
WELCOME TO RYAN'S README BUILDER!

Type 'Help' for general help.

COMMANDS:
[ New / Preview / Modify / Save / Exit ]
help:
This program is used to generate a markup document to be used as a readme for coding projects!

The basic commands are:
New - creates a new readme object for the user to add to and modify.
Preview - Previews the readme document in the terminal.
Modify - Modifies specific sections of the readme doc.
Save - saves the readme document to a file.
Exit - Exits the program
